item.description: 01: Digital Humanities – An Introduction .underline { text-decoration: underline; } if( window.location.search.match( /print-pdf/gi ) ) { var link = document.createElement( 'link' ); link.rel = 'stylesheet'; link.type = 'text/css'; link.href = '../../vendor/reveal//css/print/pdf.css'; document.getElementsByTagName( 'head' )[0].appendChild( link ); } 01: Digital Humanities – An Introduction Matt Price (view this presentation in another theme: Black (default) - White - League - Sky - Beige - Simple Serif - Blood - Night - Moon - Solarized ) -- Today Intro A partial history Course syllabus What is DH?

Today .underline { text-decoration: underline; } /* Position computations of klipse get confused by reveal.js's scaling. Hence, scaling should be disabled with this code. Fix height of code area with scrollbar (use overflow instead of overflow-y to restore CodeMirror setting afterwards): */ .reveal section pre { max-height: 70vh; height: auto; overflow: auto; } /* Reset some reveal.js and oer-reveal settings: */ .reveal section pre .CodeMirror pre { font-size: 2em; box-shadow: none; width: auto; padding: 0.

08: Data Visualization .underline { text-decoration: underline; } if( window.location.search.match( /print-pdf/gi ) ) { var link = document.createElement( 'link' ); link.rel = 'stylesheet'; link.type = 'text/css'; link.href = '../../vendor/reveal//css/print/pdf.css'; document.getElementsByTagName( 'head' )[0].appendChild( link ); } 08: Data Visualization Matt Price (view this presentation in another theme: Black (default) - White - League - Sky - Beige - Simple Serif - Blood - Night - Moon - Solarized ) -- Today Reflections on Tableau Workshop Cautionary Tales re: Visualization Peculiarities of Humanities Data Some Viz Examples Play Time Tableau recap what was most interesting?

11: Finale .underline { text-decoration: underline; } if( window.location.search.match( /print-pdf/gi ) ) { var link = document.createElement( 'link' ); link.rel = 'stylesheet'; link.type = 'text/css'; link.href = '../../vendor/reveal//css/print/pdf.css'; document.getElementsByTagName( 'head' )[0].appendChild( link ); } 11: Finale Matt Price (view this presentation in another theme: Black (default) - White - League - Sky - Beige - Simple Serif - Blood - Night - Moon - Solarized ) -- Introduction to Digital Humanities Course Topics Digital Humanities: A History Anatomy of DH Projects Archives: Endangered, Lost, Banned, Censored Books (visit to Thomas Fischer Rare Book Library) How to Read with DH Data: Zoom In, Zoom Out, Tell Stories, Play Games Interfaces, Users, and Usability Communities, Libraries, and Possible Futures Learning Goals Digital Humanities (DH) is a discipline at the intersections of the humanities with computing.
